en: Peppa and George are going shopping!
zh: 佩奇和乔治一起去购物！

en: George loves sitting in the trolley.
Daddy, can I sit in the trolley, too?
zh: 爸爸，我能也坐在推车里吗？

en: You're too big for the trolley, Peppa.
zh: 对于推车来说你太大了，佩奇。

en: But you can help with the shopping.
We've got four things on the list.
zh: 我们已经列了四样东西在购物清单上。
有番茄，意大利面，洋葱和水果。
佩奇和乔治都喜欢购物。
佩奇，首先，我们需要些番茄。

en: Hmmmm! I can see them!I can see them!
Now, put them in the trolley.
zh: 现在，把他们放进推车里。

en: Tomatoes, that's one thing off the list.
zh: 番茄，那么现在可以把它从清单里划去了。
清单里的下一样是什么？

en: Spaghetti is Peppa and George's favorite food.
zh: 意大利面是佩奇和乔治最喜欢吃的食物。

en: I wonder where the spaghetti is?
zh: 我想知道意大利面在哪？

en: I can see it! This way!
Let's put this spaghetti in the trolley.
zh: 把意大利面放进推车里吧。

en: What's next on the list, Peppa?
zh: 清单的下一样是什么，佩奇？

en: Crisps are not on the list.
We have plenty of crisps at home, Peppa.
zh: 我们有很多薯片在家里，佩奇。

en: George, there aren't any dinosaurs in the supermarket!
zh: 乔治，超市里可没有什么恐龙！

en: No, George. The next thing on the list is onions.
zh: 不，乔治。清单的下一样是洋葱。
是洋葱！我现在想起来了！

en: Very good.That's nearly everything on our list.
zh: 做得好。清单上的东西差不多都有了。

en: There's one last thing on the list.
zh: 清单上还有最后一样东西。

en: A plant? Is that on the list?
The last thing on the list is fruit.
zh: 清单上最后一样东西是水果。

en: There are apples and oranges and bananas
What fruit shall we have, George?
This is the checkout where all the food is paid for.
zh: 这里是收银台，所有食物都在这里付钱。

en: Tomatoes, spaghetti, onions, melon, chocolate cake...
zh: 有番茄，意大利面，洋葱，西瓜，巧克力蛋糕。。。

en: Chocolate cake? Is that on the list?
zh: 巧克力蛋糕？是在清单上的吗？

en: Peppa? Did you put the chocolate cake in the trolley?
zh: 佩奇？是你把巧克力蛋糕放进推车的吗？

en: George? Did you put the chocolate cake in the trolley?
zh: 乔治？是你把巧克力蛋糕放进推车的吗？

en: Well, I didn't put it in.
Er... I thought it might be nice for pudding.
zh: 呃。。。我想它配布丁吃很不错。

en: Sorry! It just looked so delicious.
zh: 对不起！但它看上去很好吃。

en: Oh, let's pretend it was on the list.
zh: 哦，让我们假装它也在清单上。
